name: Circle of Spores
description: Druids who see life and death as a cycle, wielding fungal spores to animate decay.

2.name: Circle Spells
2.description: Learn chill touch and gain additional spells at levels 3,5,7 and 9 that are always prepared.

2.name: Halo of Spores
2.description: Use a reaction to deal necrotic damage to creatures within 10 feet that fail a Constitution save.

2.name: Symbiotic Entity
2.description: Expend Wild Shape to awaken spores, gaining temporary hit points and bonus necrotic damage for 10 minutes.

6.name: Fungal Infestation
6.description: When a Small or Medium beast or humanoid dies near you, animate it as a 1 hp zombie for 1 hour.

10.name: Spreading Spores
10.description: While Symbiotic Entity is active, hurl spores to create a 10-foot cube that damages creatures moving through it.

14.name: Fungal Body
14.description: You can't be blinded, deafened, frightened or poisoned, and critical hits count as normal hits.
